name: Rolling Cat 3D
description:
Rolling Cat 3D is the first game being published by Grizla Studios. It is developed with keeping in mind the market which loves casual games + a bit of strategy. The game is equipped with a transparent control system which makes the game classy in it own ways. The concept is pretty simple, you help the cat reach it's destination The strategy which is required to clear levels is great. Every level requires patience and tactics. 
Grizla Proudly presents 'Rolling Cat 3D'
